projects.title: My Projects
projects.project1Description: Helping college students build healthy habits through food, fitness, and friends.
projects.project1DescriptionFull: A wellness app designed to help college students develop healthier habits through personalized meal and workout plans, social sharing, and motivational progress tracking. Based on user interviews, I identified key challenges like poor time management, lack of cooking knowledge, and low fitness motivation. My research-driven design focuses on simplicity, positive reinforcement, and visual feedback to encourage daily engagement. Inspired by apps like BeReal and Strava, it turns health into a social, structured, and rewarding experience.
